sentences.en: Hundreds of occupational surnames are at once familiar to us, or at least recognizable after a little thought: Archer, Carter, Fisher, Mason, Thatcher, Taylor, to name but a few.
sentences.cn: 数以百计的职业姓氏对我们来说曾经是熟悉的，或者至少稍加思考就能辨认出来：阿切尔、卡特、费雪、梅森、撒切尔、泰勒等等。

sentences.en: Hi, Professor Archer, you know how in class last week you said that you were looking for students who are interested in volunteering for your archeology project?
sentences.cn: 您好，阿彻教授，上周您在课堂里说过，您在找有兴趣为您的考古项目做志愿工作的学生，是吗？？

sentences.en: Thank you — thank you, Mr. Archer.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你——谢谢你，阿切尔先生。
